title: Snowstorm

fields.name: Weather Effect:
fields.value: - Each player who starts their turn with a ❄️ card will have one of their non-❄️ cards **Frozen** at random, unless they already have a **Frozen** card.

desc:
Post 2266
- Target a player.
- Playing this card will cause every other player to draw a random ❄️ card other than this one.
